skillTree.name: Krakens' Bane
skillTree.description: Imbued with the awesome power of Manann, Lord of the Sea, this enchanted harpoon has brought down many a gigantic sea monster.

skillTree.name: Rotting Promethean
skillTree.description: A giant Undead crab, whose pincers can tear ships apart, makes an impressive and fitting mount for the earthly offspring of Manann himself.

skillTree.name: Lucky Charm
skillTree.description: "It's a rabbit's foot. A rabbit. Noâ€¦ Oh never mind - it brings me luck. It does! Trust me!"

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!

skillTree.name: Mutant
skillTree.description: Some think her a freak abomination, but Manann's true and only daughter knows different.

skillTree.name: Sawfish Peg-Leg
skillTree.description: In death, her brave former-adversary has proved a useful replacement for Aranessa's blasted limb.

skillTree.name: Creatures of Manann
skillTree.description: "Beasts of the sea, I command your allegianceâ€¦"

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for all Sartosan, Rotting Prometheans and Rotting Leviathan units
Missile resistance: 15% for Rotting Prometheans and Rotting Leviathan units

skillTree.name: Gifted Sailor
skillTree.description: Aranessa has been at sea since a very young age, so her talent for seafaring has had many years to flourish and grow.

skillTree.name: Self-Taught Gunner
skillTree.description: Her very long tenure at sea, much of it spent relying on nothing but her own wits, means Aranessa has become quite skilled with a cannon.

effects.description: Ammunition: +25% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
Army ability number of uses: +1 for "Norse Roar", "Zhufbar 42-pounder" and "Sartosa Grapeshot"

skillTree.name: Your Worst Nightmare
skillTree.description: You really don't want to run into this one, ever, under any circumstances... Yes, really.

effects.description: Increased plunder from encounters at sea

skillTree.name: Forger
skillTree.description: "They'll never know the difference, even up close."

skillTree.name: Smuggler
skillTree.description: If there's duty to be paid, rest assured that this one will find a way around it.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for all Sartosan units

skillTree.name: Poacher
skillTree.description: The beasts of the world belong to everyone, never a single individual.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for all Sartosan units
Charge bonus: +10 for all Sartosan units

skillTree.name: Arsonist
skillTree.description: "Fire, to destroy all that you have done; fire, to end all you've become."

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for all Sartosan units
Missile strength: +10% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units

skillTree.name: Monkey Jacket
skillTree.description: "Yes, theyâ€™re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularlyâ€¦"

skillTree.name: Swashbuckler
skillTree.description: If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.

skillTree.name: Master Strike
skillTree.description: Strike hard, strike true.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Taunt
skillTree.description: There is something to be said for whipping the foe into a frenzy before the fight is joined.

skillTree.name: Cutlass
skillTree.description: "Dark Magic might be effective, but there's no substitute for a good blade in your hands."

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Wild-Eyed
skillTree.description: "Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"

skillTree.name: Hornswaggle
skillTree.description: You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Held Together by Screws
skillTree.description: Bone, muscle and sinew cannot always be relied upon to hold together unassisted.

effects.description: Melee defence: +2 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob, Boarding Crew and Depth Guard units
Leadership: +4 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob, Boarding Crew and Depth Guard units
Melee defence: +4 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob, Boarding Crew and Depth Guard units
Leadership: +8 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob, Boarding Crew and Depth Guard units
Melee defence: +6 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob, Boarding Crew and Depth Guard units

skillTree.name: Reanimated Marksman
skillTree.description: Death hasn't got in the way of this one's sure-shotted aim; in fact, if anything, he's got better.

effects.description: Ammunition: +10% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units
Missile strength: +5% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units
Ammunition: +15% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units
Missile strength: +10% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units
Ammunition: +20% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units

skillTree.name: Black Powder Overload
skillTree.description: You can't have too much of a good thing and a bit of what you fancy does no harm.

effects.description: Ammunition: +10% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
Missile strength: +5% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
Ammunition: +15% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
Missile strength: +10% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
Ammunition: +20% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units

skillTree.name: Rotten Death
skillTree.description: It never ends well.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 5% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units
Physical resistance: 5% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units
Melee defence: +4 for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units
Physical resistance: 10% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units
Melee defence: +6 for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units

skillTree.name: Haunting Horror
skillTree.description: What has been seen cannot be unseen.

effects.description: Missile strength: +10% for Deck Droppers units
Melee attack: +4 for Terrorgheist, Scurvy Dogs and Syreens units
Missile strength: +15% for Deck Droppers units
Charge bonus: +10 for Terrorgheist, Scurvy Dogs and Syreens units
Melee attack: +6 for Terrorgheist, Scurvy Dogs and Syreens units
Missile strength: +20% for Deck Droppers units
Charge bonus: +20 for Terrorgheist, Scurvy Dogs and Syreens units

skillTree.name: Drowned & Bound
skillTree.description: Like Unliving moths drawn inexorably towards a dazzling flame, the risen drowned strive - and stumble - to always be close to the one who has bound them.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5% for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
Weapon strength: +5% for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
Melee attack: +4 for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
Weapon strength: +10% for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
Melee attack: +6 for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
Charge bonus: +20 for Bloated Corpse units

skillTree.name: Avast Ye!
skillTree.description: "Listen very carefully, me hearties, I shall say this only onceâ€¦ Quiet! Stromfels' stinkin' breath!"

skillTree.name: Deadly March
skillTree.description: The once-men of the Undead legions march ever onwards, according to the will of their binder.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 15% for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob, Boarding Crew and Depth Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +6 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob, Boarding Crew and Depth Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +18 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob, Boarding Crew and Depth Guard units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Ensorcelled Weapons
skillTree.description: This is a dirty business, that much is certain, so why not get a little extra help to give yourself an edge?

effects.description: Missile strength: +10% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob, Deck Gunners, Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +12 for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob, Deck Gunners, Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units (Rank 7 and above)
Magic resistance: 15% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob, Deck Gunners, Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Masterly Splicing
skillTree.description: Their rope skills are really rather excellent, considering how long the entire crew have been dead.

effects.description: Leadership: +8 for Deck Droppers, Scurvy Dogs, Terrorgheist, Animated Hulks, Mournguls and Syreens units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +6 for Deck Droppers, Scurvy Dogs, Terrorgheist, Animated Hulks, Mournguls and Syreens units (Rank 7 and above)
Speed: +15% for Deck Droppers, Scurvy Dogs, Terrorgheist, Animated Hulks, Mournguls and Syreens units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Hardened by Death
skillTree.description: Surviving death tends to instil a certain toughness in one.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +6 for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units (Rank 7 and above)
Magic resistance: 15% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: All Hands Hoay!
skillTree.description: "Now listen up an' listen goodâ€¦ here be the planâ€¦"

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Binded to Service
skillTree.description: They could not break free, even if they wanted to.

skillTree.name: Ghost Fleet
skillTree.description: Cursed to haunt the waves forever, never finding rest or solace.

skillTree.name: Freebooter
skillTree.description: If it's not tacked down, this one'll 'ave it and kill anyone who gets in their way.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.name: Sea Dogs
skillTree.description: "You'll never find such a crew - villainous scum, the lot of 'em. I certainly wouldn't want to be facing 'em in the thick of battle!"

skillTree.name: Go on Account
skillTree.description: There's a time in every sailor's, er, life when the black flag seems like the best, if not the only option.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Living Ship
skillTree.description: Deep within the boards and bulkheads, an intelligence stirsâ€¦

skillTree.name: Gambler's Wit
skillTree.description: Such things keep the eternal players' of this world alive.

skillTree.name: Coaming & Preservative
skillTree.description: Take care of your ship and she will have a care for your wellbeing in return.

skillTree.name: Black Flag
skillTree.description: Beware those who sail under the black flag - they give no quarter and never, ever give up the chase.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Queen of Tides
skillTree.description: Aranessa Saltspite is the most feared pirate in all of Sartosa, but none fear her more than the Norscan curs she hunts.

effects.description: Melee and missile weapon damage: +20% for all Sartosan units
Melee attack: +10 for all Sartosan units
Leadership: -10 for Sartosa Norscan Raiders units
